title: Get in
subtitle: Ready to transform your business with AI? Reach us instantly—click the chat bubble in the bottom-right corner and start a conversation.

clickBubble.title: 1) Click the chat bubble
clickBubble.desc: Look for the blue bubble at the bottom-right. It opens our assistant—no forms, no wait.

shareRequirements.title: 2) Share your requirements
shareRequirements.desc: Tell us your goals, integrations, timeline, and budget range. We keep it focused and on-topic.

followUp.title: 3) We follow up
followUp.desc: The assistant emails a summary to the MoAi team. A human takes it from there—no quotes in chat.

policyNote: On-topic only (MoAi services). We may ask for your budget range, but we don’t provide quotes in chat.
